refnamediv.refpurpose: Causes all information in memory that should be on disk to be written out.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Causes all information in memory that should be on disk to be written out.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the sync command to show all information in memory that should be on disk.

example.title: Make sure disk files are up to date.

refsection.title: BUG REPORTS
refsection.para: Reports of bugs or problems should be submitted via electronic mail to <devs@brlcad.org>, or via the "cadbug.sh" script.
